name: Maple Canyon Trail
description: A scenic trail featuring sandstone formations, perfect for moderate hikers.

name: Y Mountain Trail
description: A steep climb that rewards hikers with panoramic views of Utah Valley.

name: Battle Creek Falls
description: A family-friendly trail leading to a beautiful waterfall with a short hike.

name: Squaw Peak Loop
description: Loop trail with forested areas and wildflowers in spring.

name: Mount Timpanogos Summit
description: Challenging summit trail for experienced hikers with incredible views.

name: Provo River Parkway
description: Flat riverside trail suitable for walking, jogging, and biking.

name: Bridal Veil Falls
description: Short hike to a stunning waterfall, great for families and photos.

name: Timpooneke Trail
description: Trail with alpine meadows and wildflowers, moderately challenging.

name: Rock Canyon Trail
description: Trail with rock formations and small waterfalls, popular with hikers.

name: Lake Blanche Trail
description: Steep trail to a beautiful alpine lake, requires proper gear.

name: Cecret Lake Trail
description: Gentle hike leading to a serene lake surrounded by mountains.

name: Grandeur Peak Trail
description: Challenging trail with rewarding panoramic views of Salt Lake Valley.

name: Redwood Nature Trail
description: Short trail through a redwood forest, perfect for a morning walk.

name: Donut Falls Trail
description: Popular family-friendly trail to a waterfall with a small cave.

name: Mount Nebo Trail
description: Steep ascent for experienced hikers with incredible summit views.
